Grouped_Utterances: I want them to understand how I’ve been feeling.

Hi, Ellie. I’ve been okay. I sent the message to my family. A bit nerve-wracking, but I felt relieved afterward. Yes, my mom replied. She was understanding and wants to talk. I’m a bit nervous, but I think it’ll be good to talk. It went really well! They mentioned a few job openings and offered to refer me. I sent a thank-you message, and they responded positively. I’ve tried a few mindfulness exercises, and they’ve helped.
I felt more confident than I expected. I’ve felt a bit more hopeful and motivated.

I’ve jotted down some points I want to cover. I think I’ll keep applying and maybe volunteer somewhere to stay active. I’ve thought about local charities that help the community. I think I can make time for it. It’s been beneficial. I want to have the family conversation and start volunteering somewhere.
